iree_add_all_subdirs()

file(GLOB _GLOB_X_TD LIST_DIRECTORIES false RELATIVE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} CONFIGURE_DEPENDS *.td)

    dialect
  HDRS
    "conversion_patterns.h"

)

  NAME
    custom_ops_gen
  TD_FILE
    "custom_ops.td"
  OUTS
    -gen-op-decls custom_ops.h.inc
    -gen-op-defs custom_ops.cc.inc
)

    custom_imports

)
